result.title: Final version of the training module
result.description: The first version of the training module is a deliverable describing the functionalities of the first iteration of training platform As for the differences between this first training module version and the first version of the NADINE platform it is that the training module is part of the overall NADINE platform A part of the overall system will be to adaptively train the user while other part also coexists such as the portfolio building D61 or the recommender Systems D53 All these systems along with others will be integrated under the NADINE platform D83 which serves as the overall system

result.title: Report describing the first draft of course curriculum and proposed online delivery format
result.description: Following the course curriculum codesign day a report describing the first draft the course curriculum and proposed online delivery format will be produced and presented toto the External Industry Advisory Committee at the SFI Insight Centre for Data Analytics Irelands largest research centre 100 million in government funding for review This is an international committee made up of Industry leaders who provide support to the Centres universityindustry development The guiding question behind this task will beIs this PhD course a fitforpurpose training in open innovation Similarly a check will be carried out with other nonacademic stakeholders in the Czech Republic The curriculum will then be revised according to the outcomes of this exercise
